name: Yakima Aerosport
about: Yakima Aerosport, located at the Yakima Air Terminal-McAllister Field, specializes in providing fun, safe, and affordable flight training. We offer instruction in both tail-wheel (conventional) and tricycle-gear aircraft, catering to a variety of learning preferences. Our experienced instructors are dedicated to helping students achieve their aviation goals, whether it's obtaining a private pilot's license or advancing to more complex certifications. With a focus on personalized training and a supportive learning environment, Yakima Aerosport is committed to helping aspiring pilots take to the skies with confidence. We strive to make every flight training experience enjoyable and rewarding.
